content:
Preferences

This section is where you define how you’d like to view or use key features provided in Choice FinX. 5 minutes here will save you the trouble of doing it every time you access a Chart for example.

Open MENU and Tap -> My Preferences

The section is divided into 5 parts: GENERAL, ORDER, CHART, MARKET, RESEARCH

General

This houses your Look and Language settings

Under THEME - Tap if you’d like to select the DARK THEME as default

Under LANGUAGE – Yes, Choice FinX now comes with 4 Regional languages namely HINDI, GUJARATI, MARATHI and MALAYALAM apart from English. We plan to add more as we go.

Select the default language you’d like to browse your app in. Tap OK

Order

This section is for defining your trades as default. Once this is set every-time you punch in an order Choice FinX will caliber it to your pre-defined settings here. It’s your TRADE & FORGET feature.

The section is divided into all major exchanges NSE, NSEFO, BSE, MCX, NSECDS so you can define unique order executions as per your preference Equity, Commodity or Currency

Let’s say if you’d like to define orders for NSE.

Goto Order - > Order Type, Tap -> Select Order Type and these options will appear,

  • MKT – Market
  • LMT – Limit Market Order
  • SL – Stop Loss
  • SL - M - Stop Loss Market

Select one and Tap OK

Under Product Type -> Select one from INTRADAY and DELIVERY -> Tap OK

In QTY – Enter the default Quantity Number

These settings can be changed anytime you wish.

Chart

Define your chart setting here.

Under CHART TYPE -> Tap -> Select Chart Type, Options are:

  • Mountain
  • Candle
  • Colored line
  • Bar
  • Hollow candle
  • Histogram
  • Vol Candle
  • Baseline
  • Kagi
  • Line break
  • Renko
  • Range bars
  • Point & Figure

Select one and Tap OK

Under DURATION -> Tap ->Select Duration, Options are:-

  • 1 Day
  • 1Week
  • 1 Month
  • Quarter
  • Half Year
  • 1 Year
  • 3 Years
  • Max

Select one and Tap OK

Under INTERVAL -> Tap -> Select Interval, Options are:
1M (Minute) – 3M – 5M – 10M – 15M – 30M – H(Hour) – D(Day) – W(Week) – M(Month) – Q(Quarter) – 6M(6 Months) – Y(Year)
Select one and Tap OK

Market

This will allow you to set the list of Indices which you’d like to view as Default when you access the Market Section.

Under Marker - > Tap - > Market Indices, Options are:

  • Market Indices
  • Top-Gainers
  • Top-Losers
  • Active by Value
  • Active by Volume
  • Top Gainers by OI%
  • Top Losers by OI%
  • OI Spurts
  • Global Indices

Select one and Tap OK

Research

This section allows you to set the FUNDAMENTAL & TECHNICAL reports which you’d like to view as default whenever you access the RESEARCH section.

Under Fundamental - > Tap -> Select Report

Select the ones you want and Tap OK

Under Technical - > Tap -> Select Report

Select the ones you want and Tap OK
